title: When AI takes the entry-level job
description: THE Gen Zs are entering the workforce at a moment of profound transformation. Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly automating many of the entry-level roles that once served as critical learning grounds for young professionals. According to Deloitte’s 2025 Gen Z and Millennial Survey, 74 percent of Gen Zs believe generative AI will impact how they work within the next year — a signal that the shift is not only underway but already accelerating.
content: THE Gen Zs are entering the workforce at a moment of profound transformation. Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly automating many of the entry-level roles that once served as critical learning grounds for young professionals. According to Deloitt... [5559 chars]

title: Meta plans fourth restructuring of AI efforts in six months, The Information reports
description: META is planning its fourth overhaul of artificial intelligence (AI) efforts in six months, The Information reported on Friday, citing three people familiar with the matter.
content:
META is planning its fourth overhaul of artificial intelligence (AI) efforts in six months, The Information reported on Friday, citing three people familiar with the matter.

title: Waste collection in Madurai goes smart with AI-powered cameras
description: Madurai: Madurai corporation plans to install 60 artificial intelligence (AI)-powered cameras in the first phase of a smart waste management project a.
content: Madurai: Madurai corporation plans to install 60 artificial intelligence (AI)-powered cameras in the first phase of a smart waste management project aimed at monitoring overflowing garbage bins and curbing illegal dumping. The initiative, sanctioned ... [1438 chars]

title: AI Boom Seen Driving Next Decade Of Emerging Markets Performance
description: Emerging-market funds are pivoting to capture the artificial intelligence craze, with some investors predicting that booming technology spending will drive returns for years to come. Encouraged by the success of Chinese AI developer DeepSeek and Asia’s powerhouse semiconductor firms, asset managers like AllSpring Global Investments and GIB Asset Management are concentrating more of their portfolio in AI stocks.
content: While much of the AI investment frenzy has focused on a handful of Silicon Valley firms, EM companies that can harness the technology or supply crucial components are benefitting. AI servers, for example, have become the main growth driver for Taiwan... [1810 chars]

title: AI and Deepfake Concerns Loom Over Electoral Integrity
description: Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar highlights the challenges posed by artificial intelligence and deepfakes to electoral integrity. Machine-readable electoral rolls also raise privacy concerns. Despite attempts to address these issues, the Election Commission is confined by legal frameworks, as reinforced by a 2019 Supreme Court judgement.
content: Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar has raised alarms over the threats posed by artificial intelligence and deepfakes to the integrity of elections. Speaking at a press conference, Kumar described AI-generated content as a significant challenge... [653 chars]

title: What older adults are really using AI for - according to new research
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly transforming day-to-day life. While it’s often assumed that platforms like ChatGPT are mainly the domain of Gen Z and millennials, new research suggests otherwise – AI is proving surprisingly popular among Americans over 50...

title: AI-Powered Justice: Nagpur Police Crackdown on Hit-and-Run
description: Nagpur Police harnessed artificial intelligence to trace a hit-and-run driver after a viral video showed Amit Yadav transporting his deceased wife on a motorcycle. The AI-MARVEL system aided police in identifying and arresting driver Satyapal Rajendra. The incident highlights both technological innovation in law enforcement and societal apathy.
content: A controversial video showing a tragic incident has propelled Nagpur Police into action, utilizing cutting-edge technology to bring justice. A week after Amit Yadav was seen transporting his deceased wife on a motorcycle, authorities identified Satya... [709 chars]

title: How teens turning to AI for companionship is harming them
description: Artificial intelligence is everywhere from classrooms to our homes. And its most vulnerable target are teenagers. They are spending nearly all of their time on smartphones and AI has become a companion. How is this move hurting them?
